title: Machine wash 30°C
explanation: Wash at or below 30°C (86°F). Use gentle cycle for delicate fabrics.

title: Machine wash 40°C
explanation: Wash at or below 40°C (104°F). Normal cycle for cotton and synthetic fabrics.

title: Machine wash 60°C
explanation: Wash at or below 60°C (140°F). Hot water for heavily soiled items.

title: Machine wash 95°C
explanation: Wash at or below 95°C (203°F). Very hot water for white cotton and linen.

title: Hand wash only
explanation: Hand wash in cool water with gentle detergent. Do not machine wash.

title: Do not wash
explanation: Do not wash. Take to dry cleaner or spot clean only.

title: Bleach when needed
explanation: Bleaching with chlorine bleach is allowed when needed.

title: Do not bleach
explanation: Do not use chlorine bleach. Use oxygen bleach if needed.

title: Tumble dry low heat
explanation: Tumble dry on low heat setting. Remove promptly to prevent wrinkles.

title: Tumble dry medium heat
explanation: Tumble dry on medium heat setting. Normal drying for most fabrics.

title: Tumble dry high heat
explanation: Tumble dry on high heat setting. For cotton and other durable fabrics.

title: Do not tumble dry
explanation: Do not tumble dry. Air dry or lay flat to dry.

title: Iron low heat
explanation: Iron on low heat setting (110°C/230°F). Use for delicate fabrics.

title: Iron medium heat
explanation: Iron on medium heat setting (150°C/300°F). Normal ironing for most fabrics.

title: Iron high heat
explanation: Iron on high heat setting (200°C/390°F). For cotton and linen.

title: Do not iron
explanation: Do not iron. Fabric may melt or be damaged by heat.

title: Dry clean only
explanation: Professional dry cleaning required. Do not wash with water.

title: Dry clean with P solvent
explanation: Dry clean with perchloroethylene solvent only.

title: Do not dry clean
explanation: Do not dry clean. Wash normally or spot clean only.
